caption.p: Principal component analyses (PCAs) of infant formulae sold in the UK (2017–2019). Panels ( A–D), triglycerides and diglycerides: ( A), All brands; ( B), British brand 1 (UKB1); British brand 2 (UKB2); British brand (UKB3). Panels E-H, phospholipids: ( E), All brands; ( F), British brand 1 (UKB1); ( G), British brand 2 (UKB2); ( H), British brand (UKB3). R 2 values for each component are shown in parentheses on each axis. H, ‘hungry’; N, ‘night’.
